name: Epic Police High-way Car: Real Stunt Par-king 3D
name_original: Epic Police High-way Car: Real Stunt Par-king 3D
description:
Did you always dreamed about driving a car? Your dream may come true in this
Epic Police High-way Car . You will get the opportunity to drive a
Epic Police High-way Car without you needing any license!
You will not only be driving a police car you will also have to chase down some really bad criminals. After you have picked the up in your Epic Police High-way Car you will have to bring them to jail and there you have to show your police parking skills. After you have shown your police car parking skills you can go on to the next mission! This amazing 3D police car city parking game, there is a high score mode. Where you have to score the most points by being as quick as possible. And there is a free mode, in this game mode there is no pressure while you are showing off your police parking skills. You will just have to pick up the criminals and show your police car parking when you arrive at the jail. So do you think you can be driving a police car and make sure you don’t break the Epic Police High-way Car . Make sure you are showing the other cops your best parking otherwise they will make fun of you!

Epic Police High-way Car features:
Amazingly realistic city parking game
You are driving a police car which looks really amazing!
amazingly realistic 3D police parking situations
Show off your city parking skills
Real Damage system for the police car.
Multiple camera views.
